name: query-character-string
description: query character string if existed in the specified folder

scripts.start: rm record.txt | rm save.txt | bash excute.sh ~/workspace/trunk/moxtra/site/themes/css/moxtra-icon.html ~/workspace/queryCharacterString/record.txt ~/workspace/trunk/moxtra/site/template/ ~/workspace/queryCharacterString/save.txt

author: GinMu
